message:
@TonyPotter I took a look to double check I hadn't built something like that in. Currently I do not have a direct method with that capability but I can easily add one in.

Currently I just have the main one we need as part of the requirements:
https://github.com/gt-ud-softeng/cs6300-summer-team22/blob/master/6300Sum14Project2/php-webservice-api/docs/reports.md#retrieve-list-of-purchases-made-today

Or you can indirectly do it by getting the list of all purchases and then filtering it out in the application (but that's a wasteful approach because you have to send/receive a lot more data):
https://github.com/gt-ud-softeng/cs6300-summer-team22/blob/master/6300Sum14Project2/php-webservice-api/docs/purchases.md#retrieve-list-of-purchases
So I'll get that added in for you if you need it.
